text:
Phantom | http://phantom.land | London | Developers (front and backend) | Full-Time | ONSITE

Phantom is an exciting creative agency based in Old Street. We are expanding our team and have a number of vacancies for both Python and JavaScript developers. We really value creativity and the ability to find unique solutions to everyday problems. A small sample of the technologies, languages and frameworks we use include AngularJS, Three.js, Django, Python and Google App Engine.

Please check out our site (http://phantom.land) for more info. Alternatively send matt@phntms.com an email directly with your CV and any relevant information.
